summary: Comprehensive frontend testing of Upstate Hot Tubs website updates completed. All major requested features successfully implemented including zoomed hero video, bigger logos, TAX SPECIAL popup, improved button visibility, product image toggles, About page with Dynasty Spas content, and gallery section removal.
passed_tests: Hero video successfully zoomed (scale-125 class applied)
Logo sizes increased - Header: h-20 md:h-24, Hero: h-32 md:h-40
TAX SPECIAL popup appears after 3 seconds with proper timing
TAX SPECIAL popup has working Call and Email buttons
Browse Swim Spas button has white background for better visibility
Product cards display jet counts (e.g., '61 Jets', '51 Jets', etc.)
Product cards have image toggle dots for overhead/side views
Product image toggle functionality works correctly
Product modal opens with Overhead/Side view tabs
Product modal tab switching between views works
About page contains complete Dynasty Spas content
About page has 'Our 4 Best Reasons to Buy Made in America Spas' section
About page has 'Dynasty Spas 4 Seasons Of Benefits' section
Gallery section 'Our Store and Community' successfully removed
Wet test section contains video content
All navigation links working (Home, Hot Tubs, Swim Spas, Saunas, Cold Plunges, About, Events, Financing, Contact)
Contact form has correct Netlify attributes (data-netlify='true', method='POST', name='contact')
Contact form fields can be filled and submitted
Hover animations working on product cards
Jingle player button functional
Page navigation between all sections working
Animation effects present on scroll and hover interactions
